a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Global number affected by natural disasters, All natural disasters, 1900 to
Global total number of people affected by natural disasters. This is defined as the sum of the injured, affected and those left
Source: EMDAT (2020): OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database, Université catholique de Louvain – Brussels – Belgium
